meanings.definition: A person who manages or directs a business or organization.
meanings.sent1: The managers at the store ensure everything runs smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The managers held a meeting to discuss the new project.
meanings.sent3: The managers decided to have a pizza party for the staff.
meanings.sent4: The managers are the captains steering the ship of the company.
meanings.sent5: The managers are like conductors orchestrating the business operations.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals responsible for controlling and administering an organization.
meanings.sent1: Our company's managers work together to make important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The managers meet weekly to review the financial reports.
meanings.sent3: The managers joked about having a race to see who reaches the office first.
meanings.sent4: The managers are the gears that keep the organization running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The managers are the backbone of the company, supporting its growth and success.
